long_description: the intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers. learn more about this provider #-# used to track user's interaction with embedded content. last_result_entry_key used to track user's interaction with embedded content. logsdatabasev2:v#||logsrequestsstore used to track user's interaction with embedded content. with over 25 years of experience as a producer and service provider, lauridsen is a leading supplier in denmark and poland's wastewater infrastructure industry. we distribute products that address essential needs, often overlooked in our daily lives, through our network of wholesalers and building suppliers. our focus is on providing silent solutions. our primary goal is to assist our customers in overcoming challenges. we understand that idle excavators and crews can be costly. over the past 25 years, we have trained 400 kessel service technicians who specialize in installing and servicing backwater valves, hybrid pumping stations, grease, oil, and coalescence separators.
generated_description: lauridsen handel, legally known as lauridsen handel & import a/s., based in varde, region of southern denmark, is a leading supplier in the wastewater infrastructure industry in denmark and poland. with over 25 years of experience, the company specializes in the production and distribution of products that address essential needs in wastewater management. lauridsen handel & import a/s offers a range of products including riser rings, cones, covers, flexible couplings, and pipe seals. the company is known for its in-house production capabilities, extensive stock assortment, and strong partnerships with customers. lauridsen handel & import a/s also provides training and support for engineers, entrepreneurs, and installers, ensuring timely delivery of the right solutions.
